div.salute: The Printer to all women that covet the practice of good housewivery, as well as maids.
div.p:
Good housewives, here you have a jewel for your joy.
A closet to meet your housewivery, to practice and employ.
As well, the gentles of degree, as eke the meaner sort. May practice here to purchase health, their household to consort.
And as the proof be proved true, to remedy each grief,
amongst the rest of the physics helps, the housewives' help is chief.
Therefore, good housewives, once again, I say to you, repair
onto this closet when you need, and mark what ye find there.
Which is a means to make most things, housewives use pertain.
Use all conserves and syrups sweet to comfort heart and brain.
For banquets too, here you may find your dishes how to frame as Succad, Marmalade, Marchpane to, and each thing else by name.
ne powders eke for linnen clothes and woolen, furd or faced,
to keep them sweet and safe from moths, in chests when they be placed.
Good medicines for present health in the closet, here you have
to maintain life and keep ye young, the chiefess thing ye crave.
Thus, to conclude, I wish ye mark the benefits of this book.
With gentles state, the farmer's wife, and the craftsman's housewife cook.
And, if ye reap commodities by this my friends advice,
then give him thanks, and think not much of four pence for the price.
